alert.note: Alert for Lyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 07 at 1:36PM PDT until further notice by NWS Reno
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Nevada... Walker River Near Mason at Snyder Lane affecting Lyon County. .Snow melt, rain, and increased reservoir releases will cause the river flows to slightly rise and approach, but remain slightly below major flood stage. For the Mainstem Walker River...including Schurz, Mason at Snyder Lane...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Walker River Near Mason at Snyder Lane. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 11.6 feet, Major flooding of lowlands throughout the Mason Valley-Yerington area. Structures adjacent to river in floodplain may be damage if not protected. Flooding of many secondary and some primary roads occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:05 PM PDT Wednesday the stage was 11.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:05 PM PDT Wednesday was 11.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 11.5 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 9.8 feet. - Flood History...This crest is similar or slightly higher compared to 06/01/2023. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when near riverbanks. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.cnrfc.noaa.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday afternoon.
